/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image presents a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's eye view of the scene. The street is lined with lush green trees, providing a stark contrast to the clear blue sky above. 

On the right side of the street, there's a gas station with a distinctive red roof, standing out against the urban landscape. To the left, a building with a white facade and a red awning adds to the color palette of the scene. 

The sun is shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene and enhancing the colors of the buildings and trees. The image beautifully captures the essence of a sunny day in Beijing, with its blend of natural and man-made elements.
